title: Dio's PUBLIC DOMAIN fanart doodles!
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=
look at all this ART. GO. **NOW**
(Statistically some of this art will be of your public domain series.)
]]
=====

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:minimal
|title=get fanarted
|subtitle=bitch]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+ My goodness! Would you look at the time? It's Public Domain Contest 2025 and a half!

For those who don't know me, I'm [[*user Diogene_s]] and I draw things here and there. Furthermore, for those who live under a rock, today, as of writing these lines,[[footnote]]04/03/2025, 18:55[[/footnote]] the **[[[pdcontest2025 |PUBLIC DOMAIN CONTEST]]]** is ongoing. And, like I did last year with the highly acclaimed [[[art:diogene-s-8k-fanart-page |8kon Fanart Page]]],[[footnote]]Which still is unfinished and will probably never be finished. A thousand years of plague be upon me.[[/footnote]] I will also make a fanart page of the current contest.

And whaddayaknow, you're looking at it right now.

There's no need for applause. Cue the artwork:[[footnote]]Every character here is in the same order as they are in the contest page.[[/footnote]]

1. **Gilgamesh** ,,by: [[*user Tygently]], [[*user intercedent]], [[*user anorrack]],,
